text: Movies make you immortal and ageless.
author: Kristin Scott Thomas

text: I grew up watching all these crazy movies, European movies and stuff, and I guess that I always laughed at things that were a little more offbeat.
author: Louis C. K.

text: I don't like comedy. I like funny things. I don't like comedy. Like, comedy movies are just, 'Oh Jesus.'
author: Louis C. K.

text: For me the greatest source of income is still movies. Nothing - stocks, financial speculation, real estate speculation or businesses - makes more money for me than making movies.
author: Jackie Chan

text: I will make action movies, I think, for a few more years, another five years.
author: Jackie Chan
